data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during STREATHAM cruise from Gravesend to Cape Land started at 1751-06-01

Ship: Streatham, Start of voyage: 1751-06-12, End of voyage: 1751-09-11, Voyage: Gravesend Uk - Cape Land, 1st Observer: Charles Masson (Captain), Company: EIC, Other ship information: 498BM. 1746-1757
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
